name: Baryon: Future Assault
overview:
Baryon Future Assault is an 1997 vertical side-scrolling space-shooter arcade game was designed and developed by Korean indie studios SemiCom, The game story take place in distant future, When the alien invasion is now invaded time-warp cosmo and planet earth inhabitants, Players assumed roles with four pilot fighter ships explore in landfield with air and ground themes, take controls further to going through Outer Space and Hidden Bases.

Baryon Future Assault is the game shared from Raiden and DemonStar, An ported arcade video game from the original indie computer games Baryon, SemiCom prior titles and influences themes with fast-paced shooter game and most popularity game titles hits from Southeast Asia, The game was designed with Pure Action-Arcade as an maniac vertical side-scrolling shooter admitted released afterward DoDonPachi and DoDonPachi II.
